name: Moonlight Stalker Master
text: You leave your opponents swinging at shadows while you slide elusively through the darkness.
prerequisites: Int 13, Blind-Fight, Combat Expertise, Improved Feint, Moonlight Stalker, Moonlight Stalker Feint, Bluff 9 ranks, darkvision or low-light vision racial trait.
benefit: While you have concealment, your opponents’ miss chance against you increases by 10%. If an opponent misses you due to your concealment, you can spend an immediate action to move 5 feet, this movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity and does not count as a 5-foot step.
staminaText: When an opponent makes an attack against you while you have concealment, you can spend 5 stamina points to increase that attack’s miss chance by an additional 20%.
text_zh: 你挥一挥衣袖，自黑暗中飘然而去，任由对手在原地胡乱挥打。
prerequisites_zh: 智力13，盲斗，寓守于攻，精通虚招，月夜伏击者，月夜虚招，唬骗9级，【黑暗视觉】或【昏暗视觉】种族特性。
benefit_zh: 当你对一个对手获得隐蔽，他对你的失手率增加10%。如果一个对手因为你的隐蔽而对你攻击失手，你可以用直觉动作移动5尺。这次移动不会触发借机攻击，也不会计入五尺快步。
staminaText_zh: 当你在拥有隐蔽时，一个对手对你做出了攻击，你可以消耗5点耐力来将这次命中的失手率提升额外的20%。
